name: jup-agg
title: Jupiter Aggregator
description: Lets you display the value of a token in the menu bar and lets you calculate the value of tokens
author: stevedsimkins

preferences.name: TOKEN_LIST
preferences.title: Token List
preferences.description: Choose between strict or all tokens

commands.name: menu-bar-token-price
commands.title: Menu Bar Token Price
commands.description: Shows the price of Sol in your menu bar.

commands.name: compare-token-prices
commands.title: Compare Token Prices
commands.description: Compare the value between two SPL tokens
